official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude
		  seasonal workers from the applicable large employer determination for purposes
		  of employer shared responsibility regarding health coverage.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Seasonal workers disregarded
			 in determining employer size for purposes of employer shared
			 responsibility

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended to read as follows:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Clause (i) of section 4980H(c)(2)(B) of the Internal
			 Revenue Code of 1986

text.#text:
Seasonal workers
				shall not be taken into account for purposes of determining whether an employer
				is an applicable large employer under this
				paragraph.

The amendments made by this section shall apply to months
			 beginning after December 31, 2013.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2752 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude seasonal workers from the applicable large employer determination for purposes of employer shared responsibility regarding health coverage.
